products.name: Posse Short Sleeveless Top 'Val', , - White
products.brandedName: Posse Short Sleeveless Top 'Val', , - White
products.description: ‘VAL’ SLEEVELESS CROP TOP by Posse epitomizes the essence of summertime elegance and lightness. This model distinguishes itself with its PRISTINE WHITE HUE, radiating freshness and versatility. Its SHORT, RELAXED SILHOUETTE, gently flaring at the bottom, ensures not only comfort but also a free-spirited, casual style. The material used for this top is 100% LINEN, celebrated for its breathability and lightness. The delicate, slightly sheer texture of the fabric further accentuates the garment's summery vibe. The minimalist design is enriched with structural details such as a SQUARED NECKLINE and a VERTICAL SEAM AT THE BACK, adding structure and subtle elegance. The neckline and armholes are finished with delicate, smooth binding, presenting the top with sophistication and attention to detail. A concealed zipper and hook at the side are practical and discreet features that facilitate ease of wear and underscore the product's high-quality craftsmanship. WHY PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT? * Perfect for summer days, thanks to the LIGHTNESS AND BREATHABILITY OF LINEN. * MINIMALIST DESIGN and white color, suitable for every ensemble. * RELAXED FIT, ensuring wearing comfort. * EXQUISITE CRAFTSMANSHIP and meticulous attention to detail, including a concealed zipper. * VERSATILITY and elegance, making the top an excellent choice for various occasions.

We've set sleek criss-cross straps – the top one smothered with statement stones – on a chunky, yet lightweight, sole. On a flatform-version of our triple-density Microwobbleboard™ midsole – delivering ergonomic all-day comfort, cloud-like cushioning, and a little extra height. Whether you're injecting glitz into daytime outfits or going for high-octane glamour at night, slip on to instantly lift your look. This shoe has been granted the APMA Seal of Acceptance. products.description: Hyacinth House represents classic femininity while edging on the side of flirty, bohemian, and playful. The Orange Multi Floral Cisco Maxi Dress promises to make you stand out in both comfort and style. Featuring a flowy silhouette, and perfectly puffed sleeves, this dress is versatile enough for any occasion. Dress it up with raffia heels and clutch for an al-fresco soiree, or dress it down with flat sandals and simple gold jewelry for a lunch date. Either way, this breezy maxi will be a welcomed addition to your wardrobe. Founder Cheryl Leung took her love and appreciation for Chinese culture and used it as the focus of inspiration for her brand SAU LEE. Launched in 2014, the Hong Kong-based label perfects a blend of East and West with modern and vintage, to create timeless, season crossing, feminine designs. However, the brand goes beyond just aesthetic appeal. It implements overstock fabrics, natural raw and biodegradable materials, and a lean production practice to avoid overproduction and promote sustainability. SAU LEE is the brand for the fashion loving woman on the go who desires chic and striking pieces to complement her jet-setting lifestyle.
